text: Prince Jackson takes his mind off family drama as he spends time with his girlfriend... amid reports he'feuded with sister Paris before her suicide attempt'Comes amid reports Prince'didn't approve'of Paris'reconciliation with biological mother Debbie Paris asked for'emancipation'from her family Showed signs of self - harm in recent weeks A family friend said teenager is'doing well'and is'smiling again'Her guardian Tito Jackson says the family is'coping very well'Paris targeted by Twitter trolls in recent months With his sister recovering in hospital following her suicide attempt, Prince Jackson is sure to have a lot on his mind. But the teen took a break from his family troubles on Thursday as he enjoyed a taste of normality, thanks to his girlfriend Remi Alfalah. The two were spotted shopping
